DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness of combined bee venom acupuncture (BVA) and physiotherapy (PT) on frozen shoulder, and whether if the effect of BVA is dose effective.
DOC.brief_title: Bee Venom Acupuncture for the Treatment of Frozen Shoulder
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of frozen shoulder by orthopedist Must have shoulder pain of more than VAS 5 over 1 month and under 12 months Marked limitation of active and/or passive motion range in one shoulder history of major shoulder injury or surgery other musculoskeletal pain cervical neuropathy, paralysis, neurological disorder hypersensitivity reactions by bee venom skin test renal or hepatic disorders, hematologic diseases, cancer, mental disorders, inflammatory or infectious disorders
